ygData.subject: Re: [archive-crawler] Re: Unable to modify the list of DecideRule in a scope
ygData.msgSnippet: Hello, I went back to this today. Turns out that: * Even if I launch an UI on the engine side, but dont use it, the bug appears; * I was using bin/heritrix -u
